Text: Samsung Event PrizeErrol Your prize has been processed and sent out to you on the th of January Can I check with you again if your have received it this time Please let me know as soon as possible so that if you didnt receive it again this time I really need to work something out for you Thank you and have a great day Best regards

Urgent Request on Samsung Event PrizeErrol We have still not received the Affidavit form from you I have tried calling you both in the office and at home but was not able to get through Kindly send us the affidavit form by the rd of December Sunday which is Monday in Korea so that I can request for shipment immediately If we do not receive the Affidavit by this week I am afraid that we will have to forfeit your prize Please do not hesitate to contact me for any questions or inquiries Thank you and we hope to hear from you soon Best Regards Congratulations Errol You are a winner of the Samsung Pick the Phone with Olympic Rings event which means that youve won a Samsung Yepp Mp Player which is worth over US in value Please complete the following Affidavit of Eligibility and LiabilityPublicity Release Form and fax it to fax no Korea so that Samsung can ship you your prize Your prize will be shipped out as soon as we get your reply For inquiries please forward all emails to Please remember only one prize per winner Thanks for playing and congratulations again AFFIDAVIT OF ELIGIBILITY and LIABILITY PUBLICITY RELEASE STATE OF COUNTRY OF I being duly sworn say Name I am years of age I reside at Street Address City and State I am submitting this affidavit to Samsung Electronics Inc with the understanding that it will be relied upon to determine whether I am entitled to receive the prize for which my entry has been selected in the Pick the Phone with Olympic Rings event sponsored by Samsung Electronics Inc Sponsor I represent that I have compiled with all the rules and regulations of this sweepstakes and that I have perpetrated no fraud or deception in entering or in claiming my prize I further represent that neither I nor any members of my immediate family is an employee of the Sponsor its affiliates subsidiaries or advertising agencies or of any entity specifically excluded in the official rules I agree to return to the Sponsor any prize which may be awarded to me if any statement made by me in this affidavit is false I agree and hold the Sponsor together with their affiliates subsidiaries or advertising or promotions agencies and their respective directors officers employees licensees and assigns harmless against all and any liability for personal injury or illness resulting from my winning acceptance of or use of the prize I received in connection with this promotion I understand that Sponsor will not obtain insurance on my behalf and I am fully responsible for obtaining my own insurance should I desire it I do hereby give Sponsor Samsung Electronics Inc and its agents and assignees full permission and authority to use publish and display my name voice and photograph or other likeness for advertising or other related purpose Home Phone Business Phone Signed Signature Signed Parent or guardian if above signatory is under years of age Sworn to before me this day of

ANSIXQFAFReSamsungEventPrizeErrol Im sorry for the delay As mentioned in my previous email your prize was requested to be delivered out late December However it seems that there was a confusion on our vendors side regarding the shipment Im checking on it at the moment and will work my best to resolve the problem asap We seek you kind understanding and patience on this matter and will let you know once the problem has been resolved Thanks and though its already days past Happy New Year Regards
